case.state: I've never played this game, but Peach said it was fun.
I've played strip poker before, but Peach said this place has some different rules.
So we'll be playing strip poker... I hope we have fun.
I got roped into more than one game of strip zabbac back in my Federation Police days, though, so I know what I'm doing.
I'm looking forward to messing around a little bit between missions. It'll be nice not having people shooting at me.
I don't know what she meant, though, and she didn't tell me. Does this place play Hold 'Em or Seven Card Stud? Is that it?
I need ~cards~ cards.
Give me ~cards~.
I'll take ~cards~.
~Cards~, please.
Dealer, ~cards~ please.
I'd like ~cards~.

I need ~cards~.

I plan on keeping my clothes, and this hand helps!
Alright, a great start to this game!
Oh... this looks promising!

Hmmmm. Not what I was hoping for, but not terrible overall.
I guess I don't need to win the hand... But it's easier than wondering if I'll lose.
I'm pretty iffy on this hand. Let's see what happens here.
Let's see how this plays out...
I'd like to start this game off better, but it's alright.
Well, these cards are outright terrible.
Oh no...

So, Link... You play poker?
Hey Peach, what's so special about this place anyways?

Hey, Pit! Looks like it, huh?
Oh well. I'm still pretty well off.
I can afford this loss. I still have the advantage.
What's the Metaverse?

Welp, the rules are rules. Here we go.

You could say I brought a light suit then, could you, Chiaki?
That so, Chun-Li? What kind of energy weapons do you prefer? And don't say something archaic like chi blasts.
Seriously, Elaine?
Oh, I can be very flexible, GoGo.
Oh? I'd be interested to hear who told you about me.
I hope you don't mind if I give you the cold shoulder on that for now, Mei.
It's always good to see another spacefarer. What sector are you from?
A plugsuit, Misato? What's that?
Welp, the rules are rules. Here we go.
I feel like I'm at a disadvantage here.
Actually, I prefer to wear my Power Suit or one of it's upgraded forms when I'm fighting.
Good things, I hope? A bounty hunter's reputation is everything.
I guess my gloves will be the first to go.
Let's start with my gloves, I guess.
But I didn't plan on fighting anyone while I'm here, so I decided not to walk into a casino with a set of powered armor stocked with weaponry.
What are we talking? Latex? Faux fur? Ears and all?
Is that some sort of time travel concept?
Glad to hear my rep's- Wait...

Rules are rules! Take it off, ~name~!
You know the rules, ~name~! Take it off!

I wore the blue suit first, D.Va...
You’re a little naive, aren’t you, Marinette?
Do you use that interface with some sort of powered armor? That’s what the dots are for, right? I can imagine some other devices a young girl like you’d have fun interfacing with.
I still think ~player~ would prefer someone with a bit more practice, Marinette.
You know, Seven, I was worried you’d be somewhat of a threat.
Know of any bounties I could take care of? I’m guessing there’s quite a few.
You know, I never considered implants, Seven.
Are you really what you think you are, Seven?
Those gauntlets are guns too, right?
What? That's it?!
Is... Is that it?
Weak. You can do better than just your ~clothing~.
I guess that's one way to play.
Is... Is that it?
What? That's it?!
I hunt down hostile lifeforms, incorporate ancient weapons into my arsenal, and make it back to port in time to enjoy a night on the town, Marinette.
You know what they say. Perfect practice makes perfect execution.
Oh! I get it now!
But if you play cards like how your Federation fights, I think we’ll get along nicely.
Do they have any additional functionality? Missiles? Grapples? Charging?
I guess that's one way to play.
Weak. You can do better than just your ~clothing~.
